text: Dawn FM is the sixth studio album by Canadian recording artist the Weeknd. It was released January 7, 2022, through XO and Republic Records. The lead single, "Take My Breath", was released August 6, 2021, and entered at number six on the US Billboard Hot 100. The music video for "Sacrifice" was released the same day as the album. == References == Category:2022 albums Category:The Weeknd albums Category:Synth-pop albums Category:Disco albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Dawn FM
